column5: No single males. Women, couples, and families only.   Bright, quiet condo in Lakewood area with vaulted ceilings, skylights, wood floors, tall comfort air mattress in the 2nd bedroom loft. Enjoy complimentary coffee during your stay!   Complementary: Coffee Shampoo Shower gel  White Rock Lake Trail - steps away Dallas Arboretum - 1.4 miles  Lower Greenville Ave - 2.2 miles Downtown & Uptown - 4 miles Deep Ellum - 3.4 miles
column8: Cozy Loft Near the Lake - Downtown
